blocks.name: 2sbcrex
blocks.content: Exchange an existential quantifier with two substitutions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.) (Revised by NM, 24-Aug-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2sbcrex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0))), wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0))), wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))), wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0)), wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)))
  sbcrex(s1, s2, c1, c2, w0)
  sbcrex(s0, s2, c0, c2, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 2sbcrex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0)↔ ∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0), ∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0), [c0 / s0]∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c1 / s1]w0))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, [c1 / s1]∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0), ∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c1 / s1]w0))
  sbcrex(s1, s2, c1, c2, w0)
  sbcrex(s0, s2, c0, c2, [c1 / s1]w0)
}

blocks.name: sbcrexgOLD
blocks.content: Interchange class substitution and restricted existential quantifier. (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2005.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.) Obsolete as of 18-Aug-2018. Use ~ sbcrex instead. (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbcrexgOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, w0)), wrex(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, c1, wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, w0)), wrex(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsb(hs0, s0, wrex(s1, c2, w0)), wrex(s1, c2, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  dfsbcq2(hs0, s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, w0))
  rexbidv(s1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  dfsbcq2(hs0, s0, c0, w0)
  sbie(hs0, s0, wrex(s1, c2, w0), wrex(s1, c2, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  nfrex(s0, s1, c2, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  rexbidv(s1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, w0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbcrexgOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →([c0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c2, w0)↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0]w0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, c1, [c0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c2, w0), ∃(s1 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0]w0), [hs0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c2, w0), ∃(s1 ∈ c2,[hs0 / s0]w0))
  dfsbcq2(hs0, s0, c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c2, w0))
  rexbidv(s1, c2, hs0 = c0, [hs0 / s0]w0, [c0 / s0]w0)
  dfsbcq2(hs0, s0, c0, w0)
  sbie(hs0, s0, ∃(s1 ∈ c2, w0), ∃(s1 ∈ c2,[hs0 / s0]w0))
  nfrex(s0, s1, c2, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  rexbidv(s1, c2, s0 = hs0, w0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w([c0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c2, w0))
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s1 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0]w0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: 2sbcrexOLD
blocks.content: Exchange an existential quantifier with two substitutions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.) Obsolete as of 24-Aug-2018. Use ~ csbov123 instead. (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2sbcrexOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0))), wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0))), wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))), wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0)), wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)))
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0)), wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))), wcel(c1, universe))
  sbcrexgOLD(s1, s2, c1, universe, c2, w0)
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))), wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  sbcrexgOLD(s0, s2, c0, universe, c2, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 2sbcrexOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0)↔ ∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0), ∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0), [c0 / s0]∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c1 / s1]w0))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, [c1 / s1]∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0), ∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c1 / s1]w0))
  ax-mp(([c1 / s1]∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0)↔ ∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c1 / s1]w0)), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  sbcrexgOLD(s1, s2, c1, universe, c2, w0)
  ax-mp(([c0 / s0]∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c1 / s1]w0)↔ ∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0)), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  sbcrexgOLD(s0, s2, c0, universe, c2, [c1 / s1]w0)
}

blocks.name: sbc2rex
blocks.content: Exchange a substitution with two existentials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.) (Revised by NM, 24-Aug-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbc2rex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))), wrex(s1, c1, wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s2, c2, w0))))
  sbcrex(s0, s1, c0, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0))
  rexbii(s1, c1, wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s2, c2, w0)), wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  sbcrex(s0, s2, c0, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbc2rex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ([c0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0))↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0]w0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri([c0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0)), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0]w0)), ∃(s1 ∈ c1,[c0 / s0]∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0)))
  sbcrex(s0, s1, c0, c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0))
  rexbii(s1, c1, [c0 / s0]∃(s2 ∈ c2, w0), ∃(s2 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0]w0))
  sbcrex(s0, s2, c0, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: sbc2rexgOLD
blocks.content: Exchange a substitution with two existentials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.) Obsolete as of 24-Aug-2018. Use ~ csbov123 instead. (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbc2rexgOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, w0))), wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, w0))), wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  bitrd(wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, w0))), wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))), wrex(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s2, c3, w0))))
  sbcrexgOLD(s0, s1, c0, universe, c2, wrex(s2, c3, w0))
  rexbidv(s1, c2, wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s2, c3, w0)), wrex(s2, c3, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  sbcrexgOLD(s0, s2, c0, universe, c3, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbc2rexgOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →([c0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, w0))↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3,[c0 / s0]w0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, ([c0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, w0))↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3,[c0 / s0]w0))), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  bitrd(c0 ∈ 𝕌, [c0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, w0)), ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3,[c0 / s0]w0)), ∃(s1 ∈ c2,[c0 / s0]∃(s2 ∈ c3, w0)))
  sbcrexgOLD(s0, s1, c0, universe, c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, w0))
  rexbidv(s1, c2, c0 ∈ 𝕌, [c0 / s0]∃(s2 ∈ c3, w0), ∃(s2 ∈ c3,[c0 / s0]w0))
  sbcrexgOLD(s0, s2, c0, universe, c3, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: sbc4rex
blocks.content: Exchange a substitution with four existentials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.) (Revised by NM, 24-Aug-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbc4rex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s4, c4, w0))))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s4, c4, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s4, c4, w0))))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s4, c4, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s4, c4, w0))))))
  sbc2rex(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s4, c4, w0)))
  2rexbii(s1, s2, c1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s4, c4, w0))), wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s4, c4, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  sbc2rex(s0, s3, s4, c0, c3, c4, w0)
}

blocks.name: sbc4rexgOLD
blocks.content: Exchange a substitution with four existentials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.) Obsolete as of 24-Aug-2018. Use ~ csbov123 instead. (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbc4rexgOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wrex(s3, c4, wrex(s4, c5, w0))))), wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wrex(s3, c4, wrex(s4, c5, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wrex(s3, c4, wrex(s4, c5, w0))))), wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wrex(s3, c4, wrex(s4, c5, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  bitrd(wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wrex(s3, c4, wrex(s4, c5, w0))))), wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wrex(s3, c4, wrex(s4, c5, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))), wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s3, c4, wrex(s4, c5, w0))))))
  sbc2rexgOLD(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c2, c3, wrex(s3, c4, wrex(s4, c5, w0)))
  2rexbidv(s1, s2, c2, c3, wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(s3, c4, wrex(s4, c5, w0))), wrex(s3, c4, wrex(s4, c5, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  sbc2rexgOLD(s0, s3, s4, c0, universe, c4, c5, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbc4rexgOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →([c0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, ∃(s3 ∈ c4, ∃(s4 ∈ c5, w0))))↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, ∃(s3 ∈ c4, ∃(s4 ∈ c5,[c0 / s0]w0))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s4, c0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, ([c0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, ∃(s3 ∈ c4, ∃(s4 ∈ c5, w0))))↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, ∃(s3 ∈ c4, ∃(s4 ∈ c5,[c0 / s0]w0))))), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  bitrd(c0 ∈ 𝕌, [c0 / s0]∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, ∃(s3 ∈ c4, ∃(s4 ∈ c5, w0)))), ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, ∃(s3 ∈ c4, ∃(s4 ∈ c5,[c0 / s0]w0)))), ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3,[c0 / s0]∃(s3 ∈ c4, ∃(s4 ∈ c5, w0)))))
  sbc2rexgOLD(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c2, c3, ∃(s3 ∈ c4, ∃(s4 ∈ c5, w0)))
  2rexbidv(s1, s2, c2, c3, c0 ∈ 𝕌, [c0 / s0]∃(s3 ∈ c4, ∃(s4 ∈ c5, w0)), ∃(s3 ∈ c4, ∃(s4 ∈ c5,[c0 / s0]w0)))
  sbc2rexgOLD(s0, s3, s4, c0, universe, c4, c5, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: sbcrot3
blocks.content: Rotate a sequence of three explicit substitutions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbcrot3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wsbc(s2, c2, w0))), wsbc(s1, c1, wsbc(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wsbc(s2, c2, w0))), wsbc(s1, c1, wsbc(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))), wsbc(s1, c1, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s2, c2, w0))))
  sbccom(s0, s1, c0, c1, wsbc(s2, c2, w0))
  sbcbii(s1, c1, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s2, c2, w0)), wsbc(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  sbccom(s0, s2, c0, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbcrot3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ([c0 / s0][c1 / s1][c2 / s2]w0 ↔[c1 / s1][c2 / s2][c0 / s0]w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1][c2 / s2]w0, [c1 / s1][c2 / s2][c0 / s0]w0, [c1 / s1][c0 / s0][c2 / s2]w0)
  sbccom(s0, s1, c0, c1, [c2 / s2]w0)
  sbcbii(s1, c1, [c0 / s0][c2 / s2]w0, [c2 / s2][c0 / s0]w0)
  sbccom(s0, s2, c0, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: sbcrot5
blocks.content: Rotate a sequence of five explicit substitutions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbcrot5(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wsbc(s2, c2, wsbc(s3, c3, wsbc(s4, c4, w0))))), wsbc(s1, c1, wsbc(s2, c2, wsbc(s3, c3, wsbc(s4, c4, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wsbc(s2, c2, wsbc(s3, c3, wsbc(s4, c4, w0))))), wsbc(s1, c1, wsbc(s2, c2, wsbc(s3, c3, wsbc(s4, c4, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))), wsbc(s1, c1, wsbc(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s3, c3, wsbc(s4, c4, w0))))))
  sbcrot3(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, wsbc(s3, c3, wsbc(s4, c4, w0)))
  sbcbii(s1, c1, wsbc(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s3, c3, wsbc(s4, c4, w0)))), wsbc(s2, c2, wsbc(s3, c3, wsbc(s4, c4, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))))
  sbcbii(s2, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s3, c3, wsbc(s4, c4, w0))), wsbc(s3, c3, wsbc(s4, c4, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  sbcrot3(s0, s3, s4, c0, c3, c4, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbcrot5(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ([c0 / s0][c1 / s1][c2 / s2][c3 / s3][c4 / s4]w0 ↔[c1 / s1][c2 / s2][c3 / s3][c4 / s4][c0 / s0]w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s4, c0)
} = {
  bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1][c2 / s2][c3 / s3][c4 / s4]w0, [c1 / s1][c2 / s2][c3 / s3][c4 / s4][c0 / s0]w0, [c1 / s1][c2 / s2][c0 / s0][c3 / s3][c4 / s4]w0)
  sbcrot3(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, [c3 / s3][c4 / s4]w0)
  sbcbii(s1, c1, [c2 / s2][c0 / s0][c3 / s3][c4 / s4]w0, [c2 / s2][c3 / s3][c4 / s4][c0 / s0]w0)
  sbcbii(s2, c2, [c0 / s0][c3 / s3][c4 / s4]w0, [c3 / s3][c4 / s4][c0 / s0]w0)
  sbcrot3(s0, s3, s4, c0, c3, c4, w0)
}

blocks.name: sbccomieg
blocks.content: Commute two explicit substitutions, using an implicit substitution to rewrite the exiting substitution. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbccomieg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  sbcex(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))
  syl(wsbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wcel(c0, universe), wex(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  spesbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  exlimiv(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wcel(c0, universe))
  sbcex(s0, c0, w0)
  sbciegf(s0, c0, universe, wsbc(s1, c1, w0), wsbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  nfsbc(s0, s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nfsbc1v(s0, c0, w0)
  sbceqbid(s1, c1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  sbceq1a(s0, c0, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbccomieg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0 ↔[c2 / s1][c0 / s0]w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c1 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  sbcex(s0, c0, [c1 / s1]w0)
  syl([c2 / s1][c0 / s0]w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s1,[c0 / s0]w0))
  spesbc(s1, c2, [c0 / s0]w0)
  exlimiv(s1, [c0 / s0]w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  sbcex(s0, c0, w0)
  sbciegf(s0, c0, universe, [c1 / s1]w0, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]w0)
  nfsbc(s0, s1, c2, [c0 / s0]w0)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nfsbc1v(s0, c0, w0)
  sbceqbid(s1, c1, c2, s0 = c0, w0, [c0 / s0]w0)
  sbceq1a(s0, c0, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
